description:
11.10 bilateral
Apply bilateral filter, spatial smoothing while preserving edges.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: bilateral

options.description: Set sigma of gaussian function to calculate spatial weight. Allowed range is 0 to 512. Default is 0.1.
options.name: sigmaS

options.description: Set sigma of gaussian function to calculate range weight. Allowed range is 0 to 1. Default is 0.1.
options.name: sigmaR

options.description: Set planes to filter. Default is first only.
options.name: planes
